name: UHF Traveler
description:
Goal:
Trapped inside a television in a sea of white noise you must find a way to reopen the portal that brought you here and seek the sources blocking the signals.

Navigate your ship as you look for the jamming sources, then follow the signals to reactivate the transmitters and open the portal home.

If you are not sure what to do just head towards any dark spots seen at a distance.

Until you get the torch, you cannot see much at the beginning, just move forward and steer towards the island in front of you.

Controls:

Hold Ocuclus Grip or Vive Triggers to grab the wheels, pistol or torch.

Oculus Trigger or Vive Trackpad to fire the pistol while holding it.

To pilot the ship, grab and hold parts of the wheels and turn them. The main wheel in front is used to steer, small wheel on the left controls your speed forward or backward and the wheel on your right controls your elevation.

The torch or pistol can be used to activate object.

For Extra Challenge:

Normal: When you grab the torch it shines light revealing the world and also creates an aura darkening the static around the player.
Hard: Grab the torch to activate  the aura but then drop the torch and only play in static
Very Hard: Don't grab the torch and play only by motion and environment lights.

You can always use the flare gun when stuck.
